article_title: Ocean data portal maps show significant shifts by mid-Atlantic fish species
article_description: A series of interactive maps published on the Mid Atlantic Ocean Data Portal illustrates the shifts that have taken place over the last five decades by several commercially and recreationally important fish species living along the East Coast
